techmeme.title: A look at Silence Speaks, a British startup that has built an AI-powered sign language avatar capable of accurately translating text to British Sign Language (Simon Hill/Wired)
The Taiwan dollar's sharpest rally against the US dollar in nearly 40 years raises concerns about the competitiveness and earnings of Taiwanese tech companies (Charlotte Yang/Bloomberg)
Interview with curl project founder Daniel Stenberg, who likens "AI slop" in HackerOne submissions to a DDoS attack, echoing concerns of others like Seth Larson (Kevin Purdy/Ars Technica)
In an email to Instacart employees, Fidji Simo says the new CEO will be an existing member of the management team and she will stay on as Chair of the Board (Fidji Simo/Instacart Corporate Blog)
OpenAI hires Instacart CEO Fidji Simo as CEO of Applications, reporting to Sam Altman, who says he will remain CEO, focusing on "research, compute, and safety" (OpenAI)
